rows.label: xs04080100_MSG0001
rows.name: Ah, we've been done in, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04080100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Apparently, they aren't just
simply hostile aliens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04080100_MSG0005
rows.name: They're attacking the Life Point with clear intent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04080100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Come to think of it... earlier
they said "Kill all Earthlings."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04080100_MSG0007
rows.name:
We might still make it in time.
Let's do it.[ST:wait ]
